Putin, 71, will undoubtedly win a fifth term, with none of the three other candidates who are permitted on the ballot presenting a real challenge. SANGER2024å¹´3æœˆ14æ—¥å‘¨ä¸‰ï¼ŒTikTokçš„æ”¯æŒè€…åœ¨å›½ä¼šå¤§å¦å¤–æŠ—è®®ã€‚ç°åœ¨ï¼Œè¶…è¿‡ä¸€åŠçš„ç¾å›½äººåœ¨æ‰‹æœºä¸Šå®‰è£…äº†è¿™æ¬¾åº”ç”¨ã€‚ Kent Nishimura for The New York Times In a capital where Republicans and Democrats agree on virtually nothing, it was notable when the House overwhelmingly declared on Wednesday that TikTok poses such a grave risk to national security that it must be forced to sell its U.S. operations to a non-Chinese owner. åœ¨å…±å’Œå…šå’Œæ°‘ä¸»å…šå‡ ä¹æ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•å…±è¯†çš„é¦–éƒ½ï¼Œå‘¨ä¸‰ï¼Œä¼—è®®é™¢ä»¥å¼•äººç©ç›®çš„å‹å€’æ€§å¤šæ•°å®£å¸ƒTikTokå¯¹å›½å®¶å®‰å…¨æ„æˆäº†æä¸ºä¸¥é‡çš„å¨èƒï¼Œå¿…é¡»å¼ºåˆ¶å®ƒå°†ç¾å›½ä¸šåŠ¡å‡ºå”®ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªéä¸­å›½æ‰€æœ‰è€…ã€‚ But that glosses over the deeper TikTok security problem, which the legislation does not fully address. entry.title: Adam Schiff, Steve Garvey to Face Off in California Senate Election in November
entry.summary: Schiff and his allies spent over $11 million boosting Garvey in the primary, hoping to avoid an intra-party battle against Representative Katie Porter.

entry.title: Elon Musk Sues OpenAI, Sam Altman for Breach of Contract
entry.summary: Musk hopes for the court to force OpenAI to make its research public and ensure that Microsoft cannot profit from artificial-intelligence development.

Yi Yan Fuei, his 96-year-old NÇi Nai (paternal grandmother), and Chang Li Hua, his 86-year-old WÃ i PÃ³ (maternal grandmother), live in the same house together, and Wang quickly began to observe two versions of them. There they were, enmeshed in the quiet rhythms of their daily lives â€” folding laundry, peeling fruit, napping in their shared bed. entry.summary: BEN LEWIS2024å¹´2æœˆ27æ—¥ Greg Baker/Agence France-Presse â€” Getty Images In 2020, the balance of military power in the Taiwan Strait began a gradual but profound shift in Chinaâ€™s favor. 2020å¹´ï¼Œå°æ¹¾æµ·å³¡çš„å†›äº‹åŠ›é‡å¹³è¡¡å¼€å§‹æœç€æœ‰åˆ©äºä¸­å›½çš„æ–¹å‘é€æ­¥ä½†å´æ·±åˆ»åœ°è½¬å˜ã€‚ That August, Alex Azar, then the Health and Human Services secretary, became the highest-ranking U.S. cabinet official to visit Taiwan in more than four decades. Though he was there to talk about the pandemic, Chinaâ€™s Peopleâ€™s Liberation Army (P.L.A.) responded by carrying out large-scale military exercises around the self-governing island, sending aircraft over the median line of the Taiwan Strait for only the third time in more than 20 years. Since then, China has responded to such visits and other perceived provocations by flying more than 4,800 sorties, with growing numâ€¦

entry.title: Ex-FBI Informant Smirnov, Indicted over Biden Bribery Allegations, to Sit in Jail While Awaiting Trial
entry.summary: Prosecutors argued that he should be detained because of his ties to Russian intelligence, his $6 million of available funds, and his U.S.-Israeli citizenship.

entry.summary: LaPierre tendered his resignation as NRA chief executive in January, citing concerns over his health.

entry.summary: Author Ruta Sepetys recognizes that historical fiction can serve as a gateway to traditional history and invites her readers, young or old, to walk on through.

entry.summary: Those who brought the suit were not pro-life activists, but couples who wanted to have children through IVF.

entry.title: Ukraine-Aid Critics Should Present Their Vision
entry.summary: Perhaps they have a persuasive alternative to maintaining and reinforcing our post-1945 foreign policy. If so, they should speak now.

entry.title: The NCAA Invites Another Antitrust Slap-Down
entry.summary: It makes no sense to allow generous rules for the institution and restrictive rules for the student athlete â€” unless, of course, your goal is to press the scales.

entry.summary: Importation will not lower U.S. prices, because it requires a drug company to compete with itself on price.

entry.title: Bidenâ€™s Desperate Student-Loan-Relief Giveaway
entry.summary: After getting slapped down by the Supreme Court, Biden keeps taking more steps to buy youth votes.

entry.summary: Itâ€™s the best of American modern art, on a period-piece 1960s college setting.

entry.summary: â€˜The WHCA does not, cannot, and will not serve as a repository for the governmentâ€™s views of whatâ€™s in the news.â€™

entry.title: Confidential Human Source behind Biden Bribery Allegations Charged with False Statement, Obstruction
entry.summary: Alexander Smirnov, the FBI source, was arrested on February 14 and charged with making a false statement and creating a false and fictitious record for statements.

entry.title: Comer Issues Fresh Subpoenas for Credit-Card Records from Biden Family Members, Business Associates
entry.summary: Comer is seeking financial records for Hunter Biden, James Biden, Sara Biden, and their ex-business associates Eric Schwerin, Gongwen Dong, and Mervyn Yan.

entry.title: Special Counsel Robert Hur to Publicly Testify before Congress about Biden Documents Investigation
entry.summary: Hur, who released a more than 300-page report on his investigation last week, will testify before the committee on March 12.
